snippet: Undefeated welterweight Floyd Mayweather Jr., widely regarded as the world's top pound-for-pound boxer, announced on Thursday that he will return to the ring in September for a re-match with Argentina's Marcos Maidana....

headline.print_headline: Mayweather Set for Maidana Re-Match in September
headline.main: Mayweather Set for Maidana Re-Match in September

lead_paragraph: Undefeated welterweight Floyd Mayweather Jr., widely regarded as the world's top pound-for-pound boxer, announced on Thursday that he will return to the ring in September for a re-match with Argentina's Marcos Maidana.
